body:
So i wanna buy gold but my parent won't let me buy it. I can still buy a paysafecard by myself but i dont know if i can use it on avicus shop or does anybody know how to transfer ur paysafecard to ur PayPal?

Regards,

 Matrix
body_tagged:

title: How to pay with paysafe/paypal?

replies.body:
No way to use PaySafeCard in this shop. If you want to move your money from the PSC to a PayPal account, you have to do it with a 3rd person who gives you money on the PayPal account for the PSC. But there will always be a fee!

Just beg your parents to buy gold.
